_usage: This configuration file should be saved as config.json in your model directory.
Update path8b and path70b to point to your actual model paths.
num_layers_8: Number of layers to use from the 8B model (first layers)
num_layers_70: Number of layers to use from the 70B model (last layers)
mlp: Set to true to use MLP adapter (linear + relu + linear), false for single linear adapter
Total model depth will be: num_layers_8 + 1 (adapter) + num_layers_70
